title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 93.3 - Permissive container sizes exclusively for room service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 93.3 - Permissive container sizes exclusively for room service

State Regulations

No wholesaler shall sell to any hotel licensee, and no
hotel licensee shall purchase, any container exceeding one-half gallon of
liquor or more than 15 gallons of wine, or any container of less than 25 ounces
of liquor or six ounces of wine, except that containers of liquor containing
two ounces or less may be sold to and purchased by hotel licensees exclusively
for delivery in the furnishing of room service. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
93.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
